thread.title: Quintus

author: Quintus
title: Quintus
text:
10 days ago DPD was unable to deploy a package at my door, because the sender didn't include my personal name. The parcel went back to the distribution center.
The sender and myself have talked to customer service agents at least 5-7 time to get the address changed and resend the parcel. First of all, waiting time in the hotline is on average 5 minutes. Each agent told us it would be delivered the next day.
Day 10 and the tracking id (06080086016393) still shows that the packaged is at the distribution center. This is highly unprofessional. As a young ecommerce shop we were thinking about using DPD as logistics company. Needless to say that this is not an option for us as we pride ourselves with customer service....not bullshitting customers....
